price: Had it not been for the grace that he received from his Lord, he would have surely been thrown onto the barren shore, blameworthy[13].
arabic: لَّوۡلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومٞ
footnotes: [13] Instead, Allah accepted his repentance and provided for him means of recovery. See 37:139-148.
